title: Introduction to Computing
description: Overview of computing concepts, history, and basic programming.

title: Computer Programming 1
description: Fundamentals of programming using C++.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Linked lists, trees, graphs, sorting and searching algorithms.

title: Object-Oriented Programming
description: OOP principles using Java.

title: Discrete Mathematics
description: Logic, sets, relations, and graph theory.

title: Operating Systems
description: Processes, memory management, file systems.

title: Database Management Systems
description: Relational databases, SQL, normalization.

title: Software Engineering
description: SDLC, agile, design patterns, testing.

title: Computer Networks
description: Network protocols, TCP/IP, security basics.

title: Artificial Intelligence
description: Search, knowledge representation, machine learning intro.

title: Capstone Project 1
description: Proposal and design of a major software project.

title: Capstone Project 2
description: Implementation and defense of the capstone project.

title: Computer Ethics and Law
description: Cybercrime law, intellectual property, professional ethics.

title: Internship / OJT
description: On-the-job training in a relevant tech organization.

title: Introduction to Information Technology
description: IT concepts, hardware, software, and the internet.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: HTML, CSS, and introductory JavaScript.

title: Database Administration
description: Database design, SQL, and admin tools.

title: Networking Fundamentals
description: Network topologies, protocols, and devices.

title: Systems Analysis and Design
description: System modeling, UML, requirements analysis.

title: Advanced Web Development
description: React, Vue, backend APIs, and deployment.

title: Network Security
description: Security protocols, firewalls, ethical hacking basics.

title: Cloud Computing
description: AWS, Azure, cloud architecture, and deployment.

title: Mobile Application Development
description: Android/iOS development, React Native.

title: IT Capstone 1
description: Project proposal and initial implementation.

title: IT Capstone 2
description: Final system deployment and documentation.

title: IT Practicum
description: Industry exposure and hands-on experience.

title: Principles of Management
description: Management theories, functions, and organizational behavior.

title: Business Economics
description: Micro and macroeconomics concepts for business.

title: Financial Accounting
description: Bookkeeping, financial statements, and GAAP.

title: Business Law
description: Commercial law, contracts, and business regulations.

title: Business Thesis Writing

description: Final thesis submission and oral defense.

title: Mathematics in the Modern World
description: Applications of mathematics in everyday life.

title: Statistics and Probability

description: Writing technical and academic documents.
